body: A lifetime spent shunned by others and eschewing your heritage makes you resistant to efforts to pry inside of your mind.
name: Exile's Path
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Half-Elves/New Racial Rules/Half-Elven Feats/Exiles Path

sections.body: Once per day, when you fail a Will save against an enchantment spell or effect, you may reroll that saving throw, but must take the reroll result even if it's worse.
sections.name: Benefit
